name: Bullet String
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
text: Counter DON!!-1: If your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, that card gains +2000 power during this turn.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, that card gains +2000 power during this turn.
targets: up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards
conditions: your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type
